item.title: DAT: Improving Adversarial Robustness via Generative Amplitude Mix-up in Frequency Domain
item.description: Boost AI model robustness against adversarial attacks by creatively mixing training sample’s frequency amplitude with distractor images, focusing model learning on phase patterns, thus enhancing accur…
